page.title: 16Playtime Games at School
page.content:
The games I enjoy the most are British Bulldog, Dub Dub and chain-tag.
The most popular game is British Bulldog, the rules are, you have a long stretch of playground and one person is 'on' and he or she then stands in the playground with the others at one end. The person calls out someone's name and they have to run from one end of the playground to the other without being 'tagged'. If you don't make it, you join the person in the middle and the winner is the last person to be caught.
Other games played include Skipping, conkers (in the Autumn), throwing and catching a tennis ball, ball-tag, football and off-ground tag.
